About the Company: Astral Poly Technik Ltd is engaged in the manufacturing of CPVC plumbing systems for both residential and industrial applications, and also ASTM solvent weld lead free PVC plumbing system.The products offered by the company are Astral FlowGuard CPVC,Astral Corzan Aquarius,Astral Aquarius,Astral Underground,Astral Aquatek,Astral Blazemaster,Astral Ultradrain & Astral Flowguard bendable.
